p: In chronic obstructive lung disease (COPD), patients treated with ARBs (compared to those on ACEi) had less severe exacerbations, fewer exacerbations overall, lower mortality, lower mechanical ventilation requirements, and fewer hospitalisations [ 72]. Moreover, veterans over 65 years old that were on ARBs before and during their hospitalisation for pneumonia had decreased mortality when compared to patients without such treatment [ 73].
